title: Not Long Bonds Yet? Here's Why There's Still a Good Opportunity
text:
The 10-year Treasury closed on Tuesday at 1.73%, almost 30 basis points higher since Sept3. As readers know I've been bullish on interest rates all year and hence I got a fair amount of questions about this backup in ratesHas something fundamentally changed? Was the move down to 1.45% last week just technical? My view is that this move higher fits...
